title: HIT: The First Case
short_cast: Rajkummar Rao, Sanya Malhotra, Dalip Tahil, Milind Gunaji, Shilpa Shukla, Sanjay Narvekar, Akhil Iyer, Nuveksha, Jatin Goswami, Rose Khan
cast: Rajkummar Rao, Sanya Malhotra, Dalip Tahil, Milind Gunaji, Shilpa Shukla, Sanjay Narvekar, Akhil Iyer, Nuveksha, Jatin Goswami, Rose Khan

desc: Burdened by old demons, a troubled but brilliant detective sets out to solve two confounding abduction cases — one involving his own girlfriend.
